titles.title: To direct the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service to conduct a study of the feasibility of establishing a National Angler's License.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife and Oceans.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Directs the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service to study the feasibility of establishing a National Angler's License (for the right to engage in recreational fishing in any State) and offering with such license a National Species Tag (for the right to engage in such recreational fishing for a particular species). Requires the study to include development of formulas for fees to offset any decreases in State revenues.
